GROUP LEADER Dr. Ruiqi Han (éŸ©ç‘ç¦) Principal Investigator & Group Leader
Professor Ruiqi Han obtained her Bachelor's degree in Life Sciences from Radboud University Nijmegen, the Netherlands (2007-2011), followed by a Master's degree in Cancerology from the University of Amsterdam (2011-2013). In 2013, she joined the team of Academician Reuven Agami at the Netherlands Cancer Institute for her â€¦
summary: GROUP LEADER Dr. Ruiqi Han (éŸ©ç‘ç¦) Principal Investigator & Group Leader Professor Ruiqi Han obtained her Bachelor's degree in Life Sciences from Radboud University Nijmegen, the Netherlands (2007-2011), followed by a Master's degree in Cancerology from the University of Amsterdam (2011-2013). In 2013, she joined the team of Academician Reuven Agami at the Netherlands Cancer Institute for her doctoral research on the systematic relationship between gene
